thread.section_title: Hotel Beacon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: This place is gold for travel with kids
thread.title_full: This place is gold for travel with kids - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mljstravel
title: This place is gold for travel with kids
text:
Upper west side location, a few blocks from the park and playgrounds. Deluxe market and food store across the road for catering. Two bedroomed suites. And reliable reasonable price on par with airbnb.
Why take the risk of booking an apartment online when an apartment hotel like this is available?
Kids loved the windows and outlook on a busy steer from up high and pretty quiet perch.
Only caution - airport transfers are much more expensive than you can book direct. In fact cheaper to get one or even two cabs than prebooked cars from JFK.
